definitions.definition: Intentional causing of somebody's experiencing agony
definitions.example: In every war there are acts of torture that cause the world to shudder.

definitions.definition: The "suffering of the heart" imposed by one on another, as in personal relationships
definitions.example: Coventry City midfielder Josh Ruffels described his 11 months out injured as 'absolute torture' after the goalless draw with Derby County Under-21s. (http//www.ccfc.co.uk/news/article/eleven-months-of-absolute-torture-760652.aspx)

definitions.definition: (often as "absolute torture") stage fright, severe embarrassment
To intentionally inflict severe pain or suffering on (someone).
definitions.example: In the aftermath of 9/11, we did some things that were wrong. We did a whole lot of things that were right, but, we tortured some folks. We did some things that were contrary to our values.
